secondaries.shortDescription: RED CORSAIRS INFANTRY and BIKERS can attempt Raid and Rave Action (end of movement up to next command phase)

subObjectives.description: Each time a unit from your army completes this action, if the objective marker that was raided as a result was wholly within your deployment zone
Each time a unit from your army completes this action, if the objective marker that was raided as a result was wholly within your OPPONENT deployment zone
Each time a unit from your army completes this action, if the objective marker that was raided as a result was wholly within your deployment zone
For each RED CORSAIRS unit from your army that is carrying spoils of war
(OR)For each RED CORSAIRS unit WHOLLY within your deployment zone from your army that is carrying spoils of war
